ygData.subject: Re: Revived Megatron --> Preds
ygData.msgSnippet: Hissing at Perceptor, she tired of him. Taking a step back, but in a swift motion, slashed at him... across his neck down his chest. I DON T take too kindly

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hissing at Perceptor, she tired of him. 

Taking a step back, but in a swift motion, slashed at him... across his neck 
down his chest. "I DON'T take too kindly to disrespect, Perceptor," she 
growled. 

Jumping back to avoid any attack he may attempt.. but her optics turned to 
glare up at the Clone. "Just because you have the Decepticon Matrix does NOT 
make you Megatron! Leader.. yes... albeit a fleeting one," she purred with 
malice. 

"Though... Perceptor speaks the truth in one way," as her arm waved to the 
side in a graceful manner. "Hydras is leader here. And he is far better a leader 
than Starscream." Grinning up at the clone. How she hated Starscream... to 
the point she would often torture & tease him. Though, she at first was teased.. 
but that didn't remain the case ... as she was one of Megatron's top Autobot 
assasins. 

Clasping her clawed hands behind her, standing tall... "You are also very 
bold to presume I am not all that knowledgable about Decepticons.. Leigo Maximo.. 
both Matrixes... or even Megatron & Galvatron... & many others." her crimson 
optics flashed briefly. This was indeed an interesting challenge.

--part1_126.41d2c680.2de559a2_boundary
